topic.title: PATIENT CONSENT OBTAINED INDICATOR (CARE PROFESSIONAL CONTACT)
topic.shortdesc: For the HIV and AIDS Reporting Data Set, PATIENT CONSENT OBTAINED INDICATOR (CARE PROFESSIONAL CONTACT) is an indication of whether the PATIENT has consented for their GENERAL MEDICAL PRACTITIONER to be contacted about the care of their Human Immunodeficiency Virus (HIV) infection.
